cases.title: Online Newspaper for Bonnier
cases.description: For this project we used Google News API to build an dynamic online newspaper. For our content we chose space-oriented news and named the newspaper - The Final Frontier.

cases.title: Radio player built in React using Sveriges Radios API:s
cases.description: For this project I used the Sveriges Radio API to fetch information about the radio channels and fetch playable audio stream urls to create a working radio player!

cases.title: Create a Feature Page for Volumental's Clients
cases.description: In this project we worked with Volumental and our job was to improve an important part of their webpage â€“ their client pages. We were to create a stand alone page website dedicated to one of their customers. My team worked with Bauer.

cases.title: Weather Dashboard built on open weather API
cases.description: For this project I built a weather dashboard that tells today's weather and temperature in Stockholm using a weather API. I also made it in to an Chrome extension.

cases.title: Clock App using state in React
cases.description: This project I used React to build a clock with two buttons, one to stop the clock and one to start it again.

cases.title: Newspaper
cases.description: Here I created a classic magazine or newspaper style grid of images with a tagline which could link to articles. The focus here was mostly to make it work on all screens, desktop, mobile and tablet.
